council_profile.political_control: Conservative minority administration (no overall control since 2023). 40 councillors across 26 wards.

ch_breach_spend.note: 7 current suppliers have Companies House compliance issues. Historical payments were made before breaches started.

split_payments.note: Only 1 instance detected — low risk. May be legitimate phased payment.

year_end_pattern.note: Community Capital spent 6.0x their monthly average in March. Significant spike warrants further scrutiny.

cross_council_context.price_gap_notes: WATER PLUS LTD: 9,171% price gap — Lancaster pays £28K avg vs Pendle £302. Different service scope likely.
